New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 92 off just 41 balls
Key Match Events: Travis Head was on the money
Jasprit Bumrah got rid of Travis Head
Rohit Sharma’s 92 off 41 balls helped India reach 205/5
Australia now depend upon Bangladesh to do them favor in the final Super-8 game against Afghanistan
Pre-Game Insights: India need to beat Australia or avoid a heavy defeat in St Lucia on Monday to secure qualification
Mitchell Marsh’s side (+0.223) can still pip Afghanistan (-0.650) on net run rate with a win over India
For Australia, a win over India will not only make them the group toppers and send them to the semifinals, but also substantially threaten India’s chances of progressing through to the semi-finals
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with the team's performance
Mitchell Marsh was disappointed with the loss
Rohit Sharma said the team will play the same way in the semi-final against England
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in St Lucia
Rain was expected to play a spoilsport in the match
India will face England in the semi-final
Australia now depend on Bangladesh to qualify for the semi-finals
